sentences.english: He explained the Buddhist theory of doctrine.

sentences.english: The comprehension of these poems needs the combination of the readers' heart with the poem's linguistic code.
sentences.chinese: 审美阅读时靠读者心灵与诗的语义编码融合才能解悟。
